response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I am offering this unique item for sale at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exceptional offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Should you choose to accept, we can proceed with the details promptly. If you need more information or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 750000}
